snippet.title: GlassUp
snippet.description: This crowdfunded Google Glass competitor may not have all the chops that Google Glass shows off, but it's a cheaper, more eye-friendly alternative.

snippet.title: £30 tablet coming to Britain from Indian schools
snippet.description: Can you build a tablet for £30? The Aakash tablet transforming education in India says you can, and it's coming to Britain soon.

snippet.title: Bing for Schools launches with a lure: Surface RT freebies
snippet.description: The curated version of Bing nixes ads and filters out adult content. If schools use it enough, they'll rack up points that'll net them Microsoft tablets.

snippet.title: UK schools to teach robotics, 3D printing
Apple pitches iOS 7 features to schools, businesses
snippet.description: With iOS 7 still months away from a release, Apple is already making the pitch to schools and businesses to get ready for it.

snippet.title: Microsoft targets schools with Surface RT discount
snippet.description: Company is reaching out directly to schools and universities with a Surface RT discount offer during the summer buying season.

snippet.title: L.A. schools give iPads, cars for perfect attendance
snippet.description: In a very modern attempt at motivating kids, the Los Angeles United Schools District offers interesting technological prizes for, well, turning up.

snippet.title: Christian groups sue Kansas schools, say teaching science is 'atheistic'
snippet.description: An attempt by Kansas schools to adopt teaching standards for science is being challenged by organizations that say science teaching "endorses a non-theistic world view."

snippet.title: LA schools give kids iPads; kids hack them
snippet.description: A Los Angeles School district is stunned that kids given iPads to take home manage to hack the security controls. So, well, it's stopped giving them out.

snippet.title: News Corp. readies Amplify Tablet for schools
snippet.description: The company's tablet will come with a 10-inch display, run on Android, and be sold to schools educating children in grades K-12.
